name: Dashboards
desc: Graphic interface with representations of the main metrics needed to achieve the aims of the DS project.

name: Data Visualization
desc: Any effort to help people understand the significance of data by placing it in a visual context.

name: Explainable ML
desc: Models in Machine Learning that can be trusted and easily understood by humans.

name: Story Telling
desc: The way effort to communicate the value of Machine Learning results with visualizations throughout the entire analytical process, from use case definition to insight implementation.

name: Relative Importance of variables
desc: The statistical significance of each variable in the data with respect to its affect on the generated model.

name: Local Mode Interpretability
desc: To approximate a black-box model by a simple model locally (in the neighborhood of the prediction we want to explain)

name: Global Model Interpretability
desc: To extract the rules that Machine Learning model finds in order to explain the model.

name: Making predictions
desc: To explain a model by explaining the predicted values for an observation.

name: Communication Skills
desc: Effectively communicating ideas to others, giving and receiving critical feedback and public speaking.

name: Interpretability
desc: The degree to which a human can understand the cause of a decision.
